content: spice up your kitchen or bathroom with our delightful crochet scrubbies adding a touch of handmade personality and charm to your home these versatile scrubbies can be made with textured scrub yarns for tackling dirty dishes or with smooth cotton for gentle facial cleansing each scrubby works up quickly requiring less than 15 yards and 15 minutes of your time and the end result is truly amazing the pattern consists of two main sections allowing you to practice crochet circles while learning how to add layers for maximum scrubbing power
